item.description:
Let it Rot! This month's topic will be composting in general (options, key concepts, how to jumpstart a "stalled" pile) and winter composting in particular (think: worms!!!). Composting - and "returning all excess" - is a key permaculture concept and practice.

We will potluck at 6:30 then start talking about composting about 7:00. We will also build a couple of easy-to-use worm composting bins for two lucky attendees to take home!

David & Lisa have taught composting classes over the years, but we ALL have some great knowledge and experience to share on this topic. Bring your composting ideas and questions.

Note that I'm booking this at my house for the moment, but if we get more than 15 people who want to attend, we may need to move venues. Thanks all!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: The Portland Maine Permaculture December Meetup
